attributes.action: Allow my previous petition "Give everyone in Britain the chance to smoke a joint then hold a referendum on whether to legalise it" be allowed on the e-petition website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't think that my previous petition is "Outside the remit or powers of the Prime Minister and Government" and think that it should be allowed on the e-petition website .

rejection.details: We do not accept meta-petitions.  Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
